metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6317 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Action Record in Ruby on Rails 4.2.x before 4.2.7.1 does not properly consider differences in parameter handling between the Active Record component and the JSON implementation, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended database-query restrictions and perform NULL checks or trigger missing WHERE clauses via a crafted request, as demonstrated by certain "[nil]" values, a related issue to CVE-2012-2660, CVE-2012-2694, and CVE-2013-0155.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward ebarretto> Only Active Record >= 4.2.0 are affected

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
